scripts.build:local: node ./build/scons build && node ./build/scons package --skip-zip && node ./build/scons install
scripts.format:android: echo Formatting Android code is not supported.
scripts.test: npm run ios-sanity-check && npm run lint
scripts.test:android: npm run cleanbuild:android -- --skip-zip --no-docs --symlink && npm run test:integration -- android --sdk-version $npm_package_version
scripts.test:android:onlyFailed: npm run cleanbuild:android -- --skip-zip --no-docs --symlink && npm run test:integration -- android --sdk-version $npm_package_version --only-failed
scripts.test:android:trace: npm run cleanbuild:android -- --skip-zip --no-docs --symlink && npm run test:integration -- android --sdk-version $npm_package_version --log-level trace
scripts.test:iphone: npm run cleanbuild:ios -- --skip-zip --no-docs --symlink && npm run test:integration -- ios -F iphone --sdk-version $npm_package_version
scripts.test:iphone:onlyFailed: npm run cleanbuild:ios -- --skip-zip --no-docs --symlink && npm run test:integration -- ios -F iphone --sdk-version $npm_package_version --only-failed
scripts.test:iphone:trace: npm run cleanbuild:ios -- --skip-zip --no-docs --symlink && npm run test:integration -- ios -F iphone --sdk-version $npm_package_version --log-level trace
scripts.test:ipad: npm run cleanbuild:ios -- --skip-zip --no-docs --symlink && npm run test:integration -- ios -F ipad --sdk-version $npm_package_version
scripts.test:ipad:onlyFailed: npm run cleanbuild:ios -- --skip-zip --no-docs --symlink && npm run test:integration -- ios -F ipad --sdk-version $npm_package_version --only-failed
scripts.test:ipad:trace: npm run cleanbuild:ios -- --skip-zip --no-docs --symlink && npm run test:integration -- ios -F ipad --sdk-version $npm_package_version --log-level trace
scripts.test:mac: npm run cleanbuild:ios -- --skip-zip --no-docs --symlink && npm run test:integration -- ios -T macos --sdk-version $npm_package_version
scripts.test:mac:onlyFailed: npm run cleanbuild:ios -- --skip-zip --no-docs --symlink && npm run test:integration -- ios -T macos --sdk-version $npm_package_version --only-failed
scripts.test:mac:trace: npm run cleanbuild:ios -- --skip-zip --no-docs --symlink && npm run test:integration -- ios -T macos --sdk-version $npm_package_version --log-level trace
